## Estimand

$$\tau_P(m_1,m_0)=E_P[Y(1)-Y(0)|M(1)=m_1,M(0)=m_0]$$

- Assumption: $M(1)\ge M(0)=0$

    - $\{M(1)=M(0)=0\} (Never),\{M(1)=1, M(0)=0\} (Complier)$
    
    - $\tau_P(1,0),\tau_P(0,0)$

- Outcome

    - $E[Y|D=1,M=0]=E[Y(1)|M(1)=0,M(0)=0]$

    - $E[Y|D=1,M=1]=E[Y(1)|M(1)=1,M(0)=0]$

    - $E[Y|D=0,M=0]=\pi(0,0)\times E[Y(0)|M(1)=0,M(0)=0] + \pi(1,0)\times E[Y(0)|M(1)=1,M(0)=0]$

- Mediator

    - $\pi(1,0)=E[M|D=1]$

    - $\pi(0,0)=1-E[M|D=1]$
